T
he Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner claims that these ac(cid:415)ons are in contraven(cid:415)on of the understanding set out
in A14 and are oppressive of his rights as a shareholder of the 1st Respondent.

A
llotment of shares in the 1st Respondent

T
he Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner states that the authorised share capital of the 1st Respondent [i.e. Rs. Ten

million]  and  the  number  of  shares 
issued  at  the  (cid:415)me  of

Respondent  [i.e.  the  two  subscriber  shares

remained the same even as at 26th March 2001. The la(cid:425)er is reﬂected in the Companies
Form No. 7 tendered to the Registrar of Companies on 17th May 2001 [A11] under the
signature of the 2nd Respondent.

A
  further  declara(cid:415)on  had  been  made  on  Companies  Form  No.7  and  submi(cid:425)ed  to  the
Registrar of Companies on 17th May 2001 [A3], under the signature of the 2nd Respondent.

A3  conﬁrms  that  1,262,930  shares 
in  the  1st  Respondent  had  been  allo(cid:425)ed  to  the
Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner and that as at 29th March 2001, the Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner holds the said number of shares.
The Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner however states that with the authorised share capital of the 1st Respondent
being only Rs. Ten million and with only 999,998 shares le(cid:332) to be allo(cid:425)ed, only 999,998
shares stands lawfully allo(cid:425)ed to the Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner and that the balance shares [1,262,930 –
999,998 = 262,932] have not been lawfully allo(cid:425)ed. However, as the Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner has already
paid for the said 262,932 shares by way of the capital input of USD 250,000, the Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner
states  that  the  said  sum  had  been  accounted  as  a  loan  by  the  Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner  to  the  1st
Respondent.

T
ogether with the above allotment of shares to the Pe(cid:415)(cid:415)oner, the 2nd and 3rd Respondent
had purported to issue a total of 20,737,068 shares, of which 6,714,466 had been allo(cid:425)ed
to the 2nd Respondent, with a further 4,501,496 and 9,521,106 shares allo(cid:425)ed to the 4th
